action.travelersbackpack.unequip_nobackp: 你的身上沒有背包可以卸下。
action.travelersbackpack.unequip_nospace: 無法將背包放入你的物品欄，你的物品欄已經滿了。
action.travelersbackpack.equip_otherback: 你已經揹上了一個揹包了。
action.travelersbackpack.deploy_sleeping: 無法展開睡袋！請檢查周圍的區域。
information.travelersbackpack.backpack_c: 你的背包放置在X: %s Y: %s Z: %s
information.travelersbackpack.backpack_d: There's no space for backpack. Dropping backpack item at X: %s Y: %s Z: %s
information.travelersbackpack.warning.1: 旅行者背包模組在這之後的版本已經大幅更改了關於物品欄的代碼，
information.travelersbackpack.warning.2: 若你是從模組版本5.3.1或5.3.2（遊戲版本1.16.4）更新上來的玩家，請詳閱這些說明。
information.travelersbackpack.warning.3: 請先確保你已經將舊版本中背包裡的物品清空，再使用新版本的模組進入世界。
information.travelersbackpack.warning.4: 否則這些物品將會永久消失。
information.travelersbackpack.warning.5: 這段提示只會顯示一遍。
obtain.travelersbackpack.bat: 這個背包僅能從地下礦坑或地牢中的箱子獲得
obtain.travelersbackpack.iron_golem: Backpack obtainable in Armorer villager's chests
obtain.travelersbackpack.electric: 這個背包僅能在揹著鑽石背包時被雷打到才能獲得
obtain.travelersbackpack.pigman: 這個背包僅能在揹著豬背包時被雷打到才能獲得
obtain.travelersbackpack.deluxe: 這個背包僅能從要塞獲得
obtain.travelersbackpack.villager: 這個背包僅能透過與圖書管理員村民交易獲得
ability.travelersbackpack.hold_shift: Hold shift for special ability description
ability.travelersbackpack.emerald: Gives some cool particles, nothing special
ability.travelersbackpack.redstone: Redstone block in a form of a backpack. Provides strong redstone signal
ability.travelersbackpack.bookshelf: Holds mighty knowledge, place around enchanting table just like the bookshelf to get higher-level enchantments!
ability.travelersbackpack.sponge: Sponge backpack works like sponge block and stores water in backpack tanks. It is required to have empty or not fully water filled tanks for ability to work
ability.travelersbackpack.cactus: Acts like real-life cacti, If it's raining and above backpack is clear sky, the backpack will fill empty tanks with water over time. If you want some more water, dip yourself! The backpack can fill with water while being a block too
ability.travelersbackpack.creeper: If player is going to die, creates explosion which damages every creature around, granting player absorption, regeneration and fire protection effects. Ability is available every few minutes
ability.travelersbackpack.dragon: Backpack for real warriors, combines Magma's Cube' and Squid's backpack abilties, plus gives you strenght and regeneration! You'll be invincible!... but.. what did it cost?
ability.travelersbackpack.bat: Provides seeing in the dark! Batman Batman Batman
ability.travelersbackpack.ocelot: If nearby hostile mob, grants speed effect
ability.travelersbackpack.chicken: Have you ever wanted to be a chicken? No? Well, now you are! You'll lay eggs!
ability.travelersbackpack.squid: Grants water breathing and night vision effects while being in water
